attributes.action: Authorise the draining of loch ness (scotland) in search for the plesiousaur they call the loch ness monster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people they have claimed they have seen the so called monster on holidays and tours but noone to this day has been able to prove its existence. the plesiousaur is actually a dinosaur but has the short lifespan of 35 years.so if people are still claiming they are seeing this monster , there must be more than 1 in there. if there is or has ever been a pleasiousaur living in this loch there will be remains or a creature. Drain the Loch

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
